name: dataflow_atlas
description: A web-based application for manually cataloging and organizing application data flows across multiple layers.
author: keithdc.com

scripts.build:prodgo: rm -rf app/js && tsc --sourceMap false --declaration false --declarationMap false
scripts.build:prod: read -p 'Have versions been updated? (y/n): ' ans && [ "$ans" = "y" ] && rm -rf app/js && tsc --sourceMap false --declaration false --declarationMap false
